news.title: 特朗普对盟友宣战！格陵兰争夺引爆北约内爆危机？
特朗普威胁对八国加征关税以换取格陵兰
news.title0: Trump tariff threat over Greenland 'unacceptable', European leaders say
news.content: 特朗普宣布将对丹麦等八个反对其收购格陵兰的欧洲盟友加征关税，引发多国领导人强烈谴责。
news.content0: A threat by US President Donald Trump to impose fresh tariffs on eight allies opposed to his proposed takeover of Greenland has drawn condemnation from European leaders.UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer said the move was "completely wrong", while French President Emmanuel Macron called it "unacceptable".The comments came after Trump announced a 10% tariff on goods from Denmark, Norway, Sweden, France, Germany, the UK, the Netherlands and Finland would come into force on 1 February, but could later rise to 25% - and would last until a deal was reached.Trump insists the autonomous Danish territory is critical for US security and has not ruled out taking it by force.
news.author: BBC

news.title: NASA巨型登月火箭就位 准备执行阿尔忒弥斯二号任务
news.title0: Nasa's mega Moon rocket arrives at launch pad for Artemis II mission
news.content: NASA将98米高的太空发射系统火箭移至发射台，为五十多年来首次载人绕月任务做最后准备。
news.content0: Nasa's mega rocket has been moved to the launch pad in Cape Canaveral, Florida, as the final preparations get underway for the first crewed mission to the Moon in more than 50 years.Over almost 12 hours, the 98m-tall Space Launch System was carried vertically from the Vehicle Assembly Building on the 4-mile (6.5km) journey to the pad.Now it is in position, the final tests, checks - and a dress rehearsal - will take place, before the go-ahead is given for the 10-day Artemis II mission that will see four astronauts travel around the Moon.Nasa says the earliest the rocket can blast off is 6 February, but there are also more launch windows later that month, as well as in March and April.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 韩国“年轻40代”现象：中年男性穿搭遭Z世代嘲讽
news.title0: 'Young 40s': Gen Z has found a new way to mock millennials for their style in South Korea
news.content: 韩国Z世代通过AI生成梗图，嘲讽40多岁男性模仿年轻人穿搭风格，引发代际文化冲突。
news.content0: Ji Seung-ryeol, 41, prides himself on his sense of fashion.He diligently shares mirror selfies on Instagram, where everyone knows the more likes you get, the cooler you are.So he was bewildered to find out thatmen his age have become the subject of ridicule online, mocked for shoehorning their way into styles associated with Gen Z and younger millennials.AI-generated caricatures of this demographic have gone viral on social media: a middle-aged man decked out in street wear and clutching an iPhone. The kids call them "Young 40s".The memes have made Ji's beloved Nike Air Jordans and Stüssy T-shirts the butt of jokes—and the source of much indignation."I'm just buying and wearing things I've liked for a long time, now that I can afford them," he tells the BBC. "Why is this something to be attacked for?"
news.author: BBC

news.title: 瑞士夜总会致命火灾与22年前美国惨剧惊人相似
news.title0: A deadly fire swept through a nightclub in just 90 seconds. I got out
news.content: 瑞士夜总会新年火灾致40人死亡，起火原因与2003年美国罗德岛州致百人死亡的夜总会火灾高度相似。
news.content0: Warning: This article contains themes you may find upsettingGina Russo was watching a gig with her husband-to-be, Fred Crisostomi, one night in 2003 when she realised something wasn't right.Great White, an 80s hair-rock band, had opened their set with a thrash of guitar chords, as four large pyrotechnic flares shot out from the stage. The flares instantly set fire to the surrounding acoustic foam panels, installed to deaden the sound."It was immediate," Gina tells BBC News. "It got bad very fast. The backflash just happened that quick."Then came "a black rain of smoke", Gina adds, the heat melting, then shattering, glass lights above people's heads. Gina and her fiance made for the nearest exit, a door to the right of the club's small stage. A bouncer blocked their way, but Gina has no idea why.That's when "a stampede" began for the main exit, she says, and Fred desperately pushed her ahead in the crowd. Gina says "bodies were piling up" as people scrambled to get out - and her last memory was making it through the door to safety before passing out.When she woke from an induced coma 11 weeks later, Gina learned her fiance had saved her life but had lost his in the fire.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大哈钦森家族购得苏格兰斯凯岛两万英亩半岛
news.title0: Canadian family buys Skye's 20,000-acre Sleat Peninsula
news.content: 一个加拿大家族购得苏格兰斯凯岛斯利特半岛及阿马代尔城堡遗址，交易涉及麦克唐纳氏族历史土地。
news.content0: A Canadian family have bought Skye's 20,000-acre Sleat Peninsula and the historic estate's ruined Armadale Castle.The properties had been marketed separately, with the peninsula's South Sleat Estate on the market for offers over £6.7m and the castle and its grounds for offers over £2.7m.The sale involved historic lands of the Clan MacDonald.The Hutchison family said they were proud members of the clan and recognised the  "unique cultural significance" of the estate.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 欧盟与南美南方共同市场签署里程碑式自贸协定
news.title0: EU and South America’s Mercosur bloc sign landmark free trade agreement
news.content: 欧盟与南美南方共同市场正式签署自贸协定，结束了长达二十多年的谈判，以应对全球保护主义。
news.content0: The European Union and the Mercosur bloc of South American countries formally signed a long-sought landmarkfree trade agreementon Saturday, capping more than a quarter-century of torturous negotiations to strengthen commercial ties in the face of rising protectionism and trade tensions around the world.
news.author: CNN

news.title: ChatGPT将开始根据用户对话内容展示广告
news.title0: ChatGPT to start showing ads based on their conversations
news.content: OpenAI宣布将在ChatGPT免费版中测试广告，并推出每月8美元的“Go”订阅层级以增加收入。
news.content0: ChatGPT may soon serve up ads for products it thinks you’d like to buy.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 丹佛野马队四分卫博·尼克斯脚踝骨折赛季报销
news.title0: Bo Nix suffers broken ankle while leading Broncos to playoff win over the Bills, out for the season
news.content: 丹佛野马队四分卫博·尼克斯在季后赛战胜比尔队的比赛中脚踝骨折，将缺席本赛季剩余比赛。
news.content0: Bo Nix, the Denver Broncos quarterback who beat Josh Allen and the Bills to advance to the AFC Championship, will miss the remainder of the postseason with a broken ankle.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 伦敦烟囱清扫行业因能源价格上涨而复兴
news.title0: Why London’s Chimney Sweeps Are Enjoying a Resurgence
news.content: 随着能源价格上涨，更多伦敦家庭重新使用壁炉，带动了传统烟囱清扫行业的复苏。
news.content0: Against a gray London skyline, a spiky round brush protruded from the chimney of a large family house as Josh Firkins got to work.
news.author: NYTimes
